file_content.text: This is station Korriban's Flame to unidentified vessel. You have violated Imperial space. Submit your security clearance or be destroyed.
You said I could leave this to you. Go ahead.
Lord Scourge? Handle this.
Someone ordered sixteen tons of refresher-flushing modules. I'm here to deliver.
[Lie] I'm a free trader.
Stand down, you ignorant fool. I'm here on the Emperor's orders.
Watch your tone, scum.
Transmitting clearance code now.
Stand by while I... uh, ahem. We're so pleased you're here, Grand Moff. You'll find our security airtight.
That is unlikely.
I've, ah, cleared a docking bay for you. Please proceed with your landing, sir.
For the moment, they believe I am Grand Moff Resh--but this ruse will not hold. Prepare to kill everyone.
We'll infiltrate the station quietly. By the time the Imperials realize they've been lied to, we'll have what we need.
That shouldn't be necessary.
The docking bay will be swarming with honor guards for the Grand Moff. When you emerge from the ship instead, you'll find them... disappointed.
Killing everyone might make finding out what's happening here a little difficult.
But who will I interrogate?
Cripple those you think possess information. Kill the rest.
Haven't you noticed? I don't leave survivors.
I'm always prepared for that.
Your most admirable quality.
Don't waste any time. Destroy the enemy while you have the element of surprise.
